items.content_html: Enhance your web applications with our Text-to-Speech Engine – a lightweight TypeScript library simplifying the integration of speech synthesis. Tailored for web developers, this API abstracts the intricacies of the Speech Synthesis API, providing dynamic configuration options, robust event handling, and seamless state management.
items.title: Musyonchez/Text-to-Speech-Engine: Enhance your web applications with our Text-to-Speech Engine – a lightweight TypeScript library simplifying the integration of speech synthesis. Tailored for web developers, this API abstracts the intricacies of the Speech Synthesis API, providing dynamic configuration options, robust event handling, and seamless state management.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package for easy file uploads to Amazon S3. This package simplifies the process of configuring AWS S3 credentials and uploading files to S3 buckets in Node.js applications.
